modName: A Blur in Time - Dungeon Restoration
summary: I felt that the ruins and dungeons being in such a sorry state really takes away from the awe factor. This mod aims to change that, repairing all the damage and removing most of the debris.
descriptionHtml:
I felt that the ruins and dungeons being in such a sorry state really takes away from the awe factor. This mod aims to change that, repairing all the damage and removing most of the debris.


Total dungeons and locations modified so far include:
Angarvunde - Ansilvund - Arcwind Point - Bleak Falls Barrow - Blind Cliff Cave - Bloodlet Throne - Broken Fang Cave - Broken Tower Redoubt - Bthardamz - Cracked Tusk Keep - Cragwallow Slope - Darklight Tower - Dragon Lairs (2) - and various Wilderness locations.
author: BioManF
